Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: It's time for you to look inward and begin asking yourself the big questions:^How did Medigoron get inside that hole, and how does he get out for the credits?

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #3# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Bottom of the Well#.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Bottom of the Well Basement)

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Goron Tunic#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Slingshot Room Side Chest

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a chest spawned by #Sun's Song#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Shadow Temple#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Hallway Right Invisible Chest
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Shadow Temple Scythe Shortcut)

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: Have you found all 41 Gossip Stones?^Only 40 of us give hints.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a #grave with a free chest#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Gerudo Training Ground Lava)

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Saria).text: They say it's 106 miles to Hyrule Castle, we have half a bar of magic, it's dark, and we're wearing sunglasses.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #2# major items.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Pouch of Silver Rupees for the Bottom of the Well#.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Bottom of the Well Basement)

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.
